byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: DealBook Online; Live Nation Entertainment hires Jordan Zachary as chief strategy officer.
lead_paragraph: Jordan Zachary, formerly a managing director at the Raine Group, will have a say in the future growth of the live programming giant.

headline.main: Live Nation Hires Banker as Its Chief Strategy Officer

snippet: Jordan Zachary, formerly a managing director at the Raine Group, will have a say in the future growth of the live programming giant.
